original_text: The lamp of God was still burning. Samuel was lying down to sleep near the Covenant Box in the Lord's house.
korean_text: 하나님의 등불은 아직 꺼지지 아니하였으며 사무엘은 하나님의 궤 있는 여호와의 전 안에 누웠더니

sentences.original_text: The lamp of God was still burning
Samuel was lying down to sleep
sentences.korean_translation: 사무엘은 잠을 자기 위해 누워 있었다
